=== About Me ===
<nowiki>[[File:edy_01.jpg]]</nowiki> <nowiki>[[File:edy_02.jpg]]</nowiki>

Entrepreneur, owner of "Alisia Comunicação e Design" company that uses only free software and focuses on graphic arts, technology consultant and expert in color management for print, internet and wireless networks. 
Acts in the dissemination of the Free Software Movement, focusing on Ubuntu, Gimp and Inkscape, since 2009 Keeps personal blog coquinha.com.br where in addition to his personal life, writes about his greatest passion, Free Software and Open Source. I am LoCo Team leader Ubuntu-BR-SP and member of Ubuntu-BR

My first experience with Linux was on Conectiva Guarani in 1998, been migrating to Ubuntu in 2008. After that, I became involved in the community and take the Ubuntu philosophy in my life and wherever I go.
